ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: The conversion of mevalonate 5-phosphate to isopentenyl diphosphate occurs with the following result. Which hydrogen, pro-R or pro-S, ends up cis to the methyl group, and which ends up trans?
detailedSolution: The pro-S hydrogen is cis to the −CH3 group; the pro-R hydrogen is trans.
